data.lyric:
[ti:It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:The Christmas Album 2016]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year - Andy Williams (安迪·威廉姆斯)
[00:10.04]Written by：Edward Pola/George Wyle
[00:20.08]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:26.00]
[00:27.21]With the kids jingle belling
[00:29.11]And everyone telling you be of good cheer
[00:34.04]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:41.25]It's the hap happiest season of all
[00:47.38]
[00:48.29]With those holiday greetings and gay happy meetings
[00:52.13]When friends come to call
[00:55.37]It's the hap happiest season of all
[01:02.47]There'll be parties for hosting
[01:04.55]Marshmallows for toasting
[01:06.32]And caroling out in the snow
[01:09.55]There'll be scary ghost stories
[01:11.70]And tales of the glories of
[01:13.65]Christmases long long ago
[01:18.25]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:25.27]There'll be much mistltoeing
[01:27.65]And hearts will be glowing
[01:29.39]When love ones are near
[01:32.61]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:39.58]
[01:46.80]There'll be parties for hosting
[01:48.90]Marshmallows for toasting
[01:50.59]And caroling out in the snow
[01:53.75]There'll be scary ghost stories
[01:55.95]And tales of the glories of
[01:58.00]Christmases long long ago
[02:03.90]
[02:06.54]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[02:13.60]There'll be much mistltoeing
[02:15.48]And hearts will be glowing
[02:17.22]When love ones are near
[02:20.45]It's the most wonderful time
[02:24.00]It's the most wonderful time
[02:27.63]Oh the most wonderful time of the year
data.trans:
[ti:这是一年中最好的时光]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:The Christmas Album 2016]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.04]//
[00:20.08]这是一年中最好的时光
[00:26.00]
[00:27.21]孩子们唱着圣诞歌
[00:29.11]大家都对你说些祝福的话
[00:34.04]这是一年中最好的时光
[00:41.25]这是最快乐的季节
[00:47.38]
[00:48.29]人们走亲访友 送上节日问候
[00:52.13]宾朋满座
[00:55.37]这是最快乐的季节
[01:02.47]人们会举行派对
[01:04.55]人们会举杯祝福
[01:06.32]在雪中唱圣诞歌
[01:09.55]会讲恐怖的鬼故事
[01:11.70]还有很久以前 
[01:13.65]**的荣耀故事
[01:18.25]这是一年中最好的时光
[01:25.27]你会看到很多槲寄生
[01:27.65]当爱人们在身边 
[01:29.39]你的心就会散发出爱的光芒
[01:32.61]这是一年中最好的时光
[01:39.58]
[01:46.80]人们会举行派对
[01:48.90]人们会举杯祝福
[01:50.59]在雪中唱圣诞歌
[01:53.75]会讲恐怖的鬼故事
[01:55.95]还有很久以前 
[01:58.00]**的荣耀故事
[02:03.90]
[02:06.54]这是一年中最好的时光
[02:13.60]你会看到很多槲寄生
[02:15.48]当爱人们在身边 
[02:17.22]你的心就会散发出爱的光芒
[02:20.45]这是一年中最好的时光
[02:24.00]这是一年中最好的时光
[02:27.63]这是一年中最好的时光
